PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-06552013-06-06,  ,  NR,  CRA,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectReginald Porter Remission Order
PrecisREMISSION ORDER which remits the income tax in respect of the 1992, 1993, 1998, 1999 and 2000 taxation years and related penalties, a portion of the Canada Pension Plan contributions in respect of the 1992 and 1993 taxation years and related penalties and all relevant interest paid or payable for those years by REGINALD PORTER.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2013-0068 Publication Date: 2013-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
